title: What is the best scene of Lawrence of Arabia? - Quora

response.answer_text: What to choose? The scene with Jose Ferrer….so subtly done…. The scene when Lawrence comes in out of the desert and walks into the officers club and orders a lemonade for his young friend. My personal favorite…..when Lawrence is being briefed about the nature of the mission to find King Faud. And the officer stresses the danger and says, “It will be a dangerous and difficult mission.” and Lawrence replies.”No it will be fun.”
I love the attack on Aqaba.  It's so grand in scale and it visually imparts so much.  The attackers move in and as the scene ends great artillery pieces come into view.  All facing the wrong way.
